| HistoryText             = 
[[Ophelia Sarkissian (Earth-616)|Madame Hydra]] killed the original [[Jordan Dixon (Earth-616)|Viper]] and took his name as her own. The new Viper then reunited the Serpent Squad. She convinced the [[Leopold Stryke (Earth-616)|Eel]] to join the team to avenge his brother's death and then [[Zelda DuBois (Earth-616)|Princess Python]] joined. [[Klaus Voorhees (Earth-616)|Cobra]] did not wish to serve Viper, and challenged her to a fight, but was defeated. 

The team later worked with Warlord [[Krang (Earth-616)|Krang]] in an attempt to raise the lost continent of [[Lemuria (Pacific Ocean)|Lemuria]]. The Serpent Squad was defeated by [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]], using his Nomad identity, who defeated the Eel and Princess Python. Cobra turned on Viper and she shot him in the back but he managed to escape. Nomad then rushed Cobra to the hospital.

==Serpent Squad==
* [[Ophelia Sarkissian (Earth-616)|Madame Hydra / Viper (Ophelia Sarkissian)]]
* [[Klaus Voorhees (Earth-616)|King Cobra (Klaus Voorhees)]], was mutagenically altered via radiated snake venom. Very flexible and slithery body, Superhuman athletic abilities and Wall crawling. 
* [[Leopold Stryke (Earth-616)|Eel (Leopold Stryke)]] - the original Eel, was the curator of an aquarium who led a secret life as a costumed criminal. Eel received all of his powers from the suit he had constructed. 
* [[Zelda DuBois (Earth-616)|Princess Python (Zelda DuBois)]]
